price: 83.Tama edde yabne xeetiy girai alasney kallak yani Nabii Mucammadow ku Rabbih xaquk kulli xaa как edde radu waah qidu waa numih migaq astah kutbeh le, ama xeet Qhoreyshi korosuy daalimiinih tanik xer riket mayan iyye Yalli.
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
